title: Rage
tags: how to unlock rage in bg3
content:
Rage Class Actions While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects. You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. 10 turns Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn. You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging. Bonus ActionRage Charge
